trigger_event.details: Led by Accel with Okta Ventures, Gradient Ventures, Menlo Ventures, Anthropic, Coinbase Ventures

signals.signal: CEO is former Shopify Director of Engineering (Payments)
Building financial layer for AI agents

pain_points.point: Investor reporting for new Accel-led round
Financial controls at seed→Series A transition
Cash flow management with new capital injection

decision_makers.name: Ilan Zerbib
decision_makers.title: CEO & Co-founder
decision_makers.background: Former Shopify Director of Engineering (Payments), 5 years

suppositions: Will need formal financial controls for Series A prep
CEO understands value of financial infrastructure (Shopify background)
doubts: Is Ilan already planning a full-time CFO hire?
Does Accel provide portfolio CFO resources?
lead.outreach_angle: Hi Ilan, congrats on the Sapiom seed round! Building financial infrastructure for AI agents puts you at the intersection of fintech and AI - two sectors where financial operations complexity scales fast. I work with seed-stage B2B companies post-funding to set up investor reporting frameworks and financial controls before the Series A crunch.
lead.recommended_action: LinkedIn connection request to Ilan Zerbib within 48 hours while funding news is fresh
evidence_limitations: CFO need inferred, not directly evidenced
No visibility into current finance team

trigger_event.details: Led by CapitalG (Alphabet's growth fund), Index Ventures participating

signals.signal: Series A funding from top-tier growth fund

certainties: Raised Series A with CapitalG leading
suppositions: Founders have high bar for financial operations (Stripe background)
doubts: Does European location make US fractional CFO less relevant?
Do they already have EU-based finance team?
lead.outreach_angle: Hi Duco, congrats on the Duna Series A! Building a global trust infrastructure for business identity is ambitious - and with CapitalG's involvement, the reporting bar just got higher. I help Series A fintechs set up multi-entity financial operations and investor-grade reporting systems. Given your dual HQ setup, might be worth a brief chat.
lead.recommended_action: LinkedIn connection to Duco van Lanschot. Reference his Stripe background and KYB expertise. Test receptiveness to US-based advisor.
evidence_limitations: European company assessed with US-centric lens
No visibility into current finance structure

signals.signal: Replaces agency-heavy model with AI agents

pain_points.point: Cash flow management with multi-year contracts

doubts: Is funding size ($5.7M) sufficient to justify fractional CFO spend?
Will they defer CFO decision until Series A?
lead.outreach_angle: Hi Ankur, congrats on the Fibr AI seed extension! The shift from agency-driven personalization to autonomous AI agents is a massive opportunity - but enterprise sales cycles with banks and healthcare providers require tight financial operations. I work with Accel-backed startups to set up financial infrastructure that scales with enterprise growth.
lead.recommended_action: LinkedIn connection to Ankur Goyal. Reference enterprise customer traction. Lower priority than Sapiom/Duna.
evidence_limitations: Lower funding amount may not prioritize CFO spend
